name: crawly

A crawly insect or other animal moves along on its legs or body close to the ground: Every time I turned a stone over, something nasty, black, and crawly crept out. Beneath one fallen tree, investigators found beetles and a mass of crawly worms. Related word
crawl
More examplesFewer examplesAvoid pesticides, which kill not only hedgehogs but their crawly food sources, too.There was a compost heap of crawly worms at the bottom of the garden.The horror of it was that the creeping, crawly thing made no sound - only crawled!
